My fellow countrymen, I stand before you today, my heart burning with the same fire that fuels your outrage, your frustration, and your desperation. We have been lied to, we have been cheated, and we have been betrayed. The system, the elites, the foreigners, they have all conspired against us, against our prosperity, against our greatness.

You, the hardworking men and women of this land, you are the backbone of our nation. You toil, you sweat, you bleed, and yet, you are the ones who are suffering. Your wages are stagnant, your jobs are scarce, your future is uncertain. And why? Because of them, the immigrants, the invaders, the parasites who suck our blood, who drain our resources, who steal our jobs.

They come here, uninvited, unwelcome, and ungrateful. They take and take and take, but they give nothing in return. They clog our streets, they overcrowd our schools, they infect our hospitals. They are a plague, a cancer, a disease that must be cut out if we are to survive.

And what do our leaders do? They coddle them, they pamper them, they reward them. They give them our money, our benefits, our privileges. They throw open the doors, and they invite them in, like a Trojan horse, to destroy us from within.

But I tell you, my friends, I will not be swayed. I will not be silenced. I will not be deterred. I will rise up, I will fight, I will scream, I will shout, until the world hears our cry. Until the world knows our pain. Until the world feels our rage.

We will take back our country, we will reclaim our heritage, we will restore our glory. We will build a wall, a wall of steel, a wall of fire, a wall of blood, to keep them out, to keep us safe. We will deport them, we will expel them, we will eradicate them. We will make our nation great again, we will make our people proud again, we will make our future bright again.

So I ask you, my fellow countrymen, will you stand with me? Will you fight with me? Will you bleed with me? Will you die with me? For our nation, for our freedom, for our very existence? The choice is yours, but know this: I will not back down, I will not surrender, I will not be defeated.
